subject: Golf
Weather
lead_paragraph: For about two decades, a small group of friends from Lemont, Ill., have been playing golf through whatever weather is thrown at them: rain, snow, howling winds and temperatures well south of zero.
snippet: For about two decades, a small group of friends from Lemont, Ill., have been playing golf through whatever weather is thrown at them: rain, snow, howling winds and temperatures well south of zero.
